svcproc.title: Eaton Customer Bulletin

para.title: Squawk with Eaton Spicer Angle-Ring 350 mm Clutches

svcproc.para: There is a potential for "squawk," i.e., clutch noise, with the Eaton Spicer Angle-Ring 350 mm clutch. Some "squawk" or "chirp" is sometimes heard at clutch engagement, when the ceramic facing material contacts the flywheel. This noise is especially noticeable when starting in second or third gear, or in vehicles with poor startability, causing the clutch to slip for a longer period of time before complete engagement.
This "squawk" is inherent to the product, and causes NO problems to the life of the clutch or to the vehicle. This characteristic is considered normal, and is NOT covered under vehicle warranty.
